faces.stripped_text: Whenever you rez a piece of ice, give the Runner 1 tag. Whenever the Runner accesses cards, he or she accesses 1 fewer card if he or she is tagged (to a minimum of 1 card).
faces.text:
Whenever you rez a piece of ice, give the Runner 1 tag.
Whenever the Runner accesses cards, he or she accesses 1 fewer card if he or she is tagged (to a minimum of 1 card).
